titleStmt.title: A defence and continuation of the ecclesiastical politie by way of letter to a friend in London : together with a letter from the author of The friendly debate.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Samuel, 1640-1688.
Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707. Friendly debate.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. Clark for J. Martyn ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to Samuel Parker. cf. NUC pre-1956.
Written in answer to John Owen's Truth and innocence vindicated.
